name: UNetLab-X-Integration
tagline: a tool which helps UNetLab to integrate with Ubuntu/Debian
body:
### Description
UNetLab-X-Integration is the equivalent of [Windows integration pack](http://www.unetlab.com/download/UNetLab-Win-Client-Pack.exe) for Ubuntu/Debian.

After install the package you can open URLs like the following:
* telnet://
* capture://
* docker://
* vnc:// (via Vinagre)
* rdp:// (via Vinagre)
* ssh:// (via Vinagre)

Tested on Ubuntu 14.04 with Google Chrome and Firefox.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
